[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Struct: RawBatch] [rocksdb version compatibility] Can batch operations created with one rocksdb version be incompatible with another version causing corruption? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [rocksdb compaction] Do batch operations trigger rocksdb compaction that could cause temporary performance degradation? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Write stall] Can large batches trigger rocksdb write stalls that block other database operations causing liveness issues? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Reference lifetime] Are all references in batch operations properly lifetime-checked to prevent dangling references? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Function: SchemaBatch::into_raw_batch()] [Move semantics] When self is consumed by into_raw_batch(), are all resources properly moved without leaving dangling pointers? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Schema migration] Can batch operations created before a schema upgrade be applied after the upgrade without corruption? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Backward compatibility] Are batch operation formats backward compatible, or can they break after node upgrades? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Function: WriteBatch::put()] [Value validation] Beyond encoding, are values validated for business logic constraints before being added to batches? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Function: WriteBatch::delete()] [Deletion permission] Are deletion operations checked against access control rules before being added to batches? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Recovery replay] If batches are replayed during crash recovery, can duplicate application cause state corruption? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Checkpoint consistency] Can batches span checkpoint boundaries, causing inconsistencies between checkpointed and live state? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Batch serialization] Can batches be serialized for replication, and are there deserialization vulnerabilities? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Replication ordering] Can batch replication order differ from commit order, causing replica state divergence? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Struct: BatchStats] [Stats overflow] Can the HashMap in BatchStats grow unbounded if many different column families are used? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Function: BatchStats::commit()] [Metric label injection] Can malicious column family names contain special characters that break metric label parsing? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Block boundary] Can batches span multiple blocks, potentially violating block atomicity guarantees? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Transaction nesting] Can batch operations be nested within transactions, and does this create deadlock opportunities? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Key pattern leakage] Can batch operation patterns leak information about private transaction details through timing or metrics? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Column family enumeration] Can attackers enumerate valid column families by observing error messages from invalid cf_name values? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Struct: NativeBatch] [Parallel batch construction] Can multiple threads construct different NativeBatch instances for the same DB safely? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Lock contention] Do batch operations acquire database locks that could cause lock contention with readers? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Commit finality] Once a batch is committed, are the changes immediately visible to all readers or is there a delay? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Abort mechanism] Can batch operations be aborted after being queued but before commit, and is this safe? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Trait: WriteBatch] [Schema mismatch] Can put() and delete() be called with mismatched Schema types on the same batch causing type confusion? (High)
